title:
Globally solvable complexes of pseudo-differential operators on the
  torus
authors: Fernando de \'Avila Silva and Cleber de Medeira
abstract:
We consider a complex of pseudo-differential operators associated with an
overdetermined system of operators defined on the torus. We characterize the
global solvability of this complex when the system has constant coefficients.
Furthermore, we establish some connections between the global solvability of
the complex and the global solvability of its normal form.
